Welcome

Welcome to our calculator program! We offer two distinct styles for you to choose from.
Calculator 1.0 features a pink background complemented by buttons in gray, white, red, and blue.
On the other hand, Calculator 2.0 boasts a blue background with buttons in gray, white, green, and red.
Feel free to select the calculator that best aligns with your personal style!
